title: Implement parser: class and instance declarations, deriving
body:
Implement parsing of type class declarations, instance declarations, and deriving clauses.

**Deliverables:**
- `class` declarations: `class (Super a) => ClassName a where { methods }`
  - Method type signatures
  - Default method implementations
- `instance` declarations: `instance ClassName Type where { methods }`
- `deriving` clauses on data/newtype: `deriving (Show, Eq, Ord, Read)`
- GADT-style data declarations: `data T a where { Con :: Type }`
- Unit tests for each construct

**Design notes:**
- Multi-parameter type classes are deferred
- Functional dependencies are deferred
- Associated types are deferred
- Stock deriving only (Show, Eq, Ord, Read) — no GeneralizedNewtypeDeriving or DeriveAnyClass
